name: MetrictoImperialUnitsConversion
0:
”Alexa, ask convert metric to convert 2 meter”
”How much is 90 Celsius in Fahrenheit”
”how many are 100 dollar in euro”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: convert metric
des:
This program converts common units in
 length: kilometer, meter, centimeter, millimeter to miles, feet and inches
weight: kilogram, gram to pound and ounce
 temperature: Celsius to Fahrenheit
money amount : dollar to euro and sterling
you can just specify the metric part, the program will find the most suitable conversion for you. should be useful for people travelling aboard.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
